alert.note: Alert for Charles Mix; Gregory (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:19PM MDT until July 14 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHARLES MIX AND SOUTHEASTERN GREGORY COUNTIES... At 617 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marty, or near Pickstown, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 609 pm, a 67 mph gust was reported at the Ft. Randall Dam! IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Charles Mix and southeastern Gregory Counties, including the following locations... southwestern Yankton Sioux Tribal Nation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
